prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with large claws and a bushy beard.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into the ocean with its orange body and white accents.
Generate a Pokemon with a powerful pinch and a determined expression.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in coastal habitats and has a unique shell-like feature.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a crab with a fierce demeanor and bright colors.
Show me a Pokemon that can fight effectively in the water with its strong pincers.
Make a Pokemon that uses its claws to defend itself against predators in its environment.
